titleStmt.title: The Christian mans walke with the most regardable and remarkable steppes thereof, the true rule according to which, and manner how we must walke: shewing the infallible properties of the children of light. Newly published by the author Nathanael Cole, Preacher at S. Leonards Bromley in Middlesex, on the backside of Stratford-Bow neere London.
titleStmt.author: Cole, Nathaniel, 1584 or 5-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Thomas Pauier, dwelling in Iuy-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; index lacking and tightly bound, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Glasgow. Library.
